txt.en: Several sinister-looking barrels lie around Abedec's Watch in the southern tip of the Havens of Belfalas.\n\nYou should destroy the barrels, for they are likely filled with some weaponry to be used by the Corsairs against Gondor.
You have destroyed the explosives brought ashore by Abedec's Corsairs. They were surely intended to bring down the old stone walls of Gondor's ancient cities.
Several sinister-looking barrels lie around Abedec's Watch in the southern tip of the Havens of Belfalas.

Sinister-looking barrels are scattered around Abedec's Watch in southern Belfalas.\n\nYou should destroy the sinister-looking barrels.
